features: 【A must-have for home and travel】Can be used on silk, plush, cotton, linen and other fabrics. The space-saving, lightweight and compact design of the mini hand iron makes it perfect for travel, fits easily into suitcases and backpacks, and is easy to carry with you.

【Upgraded Heating】The titanium alloy soleplate can heat up quickly at a constant temperature - so you won't damage your clothes when you iron them.2 in 1 :dry ironing and wet ironing. Use traditional dry ironing: Use its large titanium panels to dry wet areas of your garment.

【Perfect holiday or wedding gift】: Give your loved ones the ideal gift for any holiday or special occasion. Impress your friends and family with our handheld garment steamer with its stunning and luxurious design!

【Upgraded design】: Corded mini body, premium shape colors and adjustable angle handle enhance the experience of this iron. The handle can have three angle points to meet different iron usage situations, and can be rotated 0°-90°-180° to adjust the space for holding the handle.

【50ML capacity 】the water tank is hidden and integrated with the ironing machine. Before use, just open the lid of the water tank and add water to the water tank with a water bottle to prevent splashing. You can check the water level in The-Tank at any time.
